sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài zhōngxué xuéxí sān nián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'étudie au collège depuis trois ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have been studying at middle school for three years.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est collégien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a middle school student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jiā yǒu sì kǒu rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma famille compte quatre personnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My family has four people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'attendre cinq minutes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait for me five minutes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng fān dào dì shí yè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tourner à la page dix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn to page ten.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils sont mes collègues.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They are my colleagues.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est venu en Chine pour étudier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He came to China to study.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La bibliothèque est là-bas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The library is over there.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est très longue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is very long.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cháng qù nà jiā cāntīng chīfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il va souvent manger dans ce restaurant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often goes to eat at that restaurant.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le bâtiment d'enseignement est à côté de la bibliothèque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teaching building is next to the library.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comment est ce film ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How is this movie?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonjour, puis-je vous demander votre nom de famille ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hello, may I ask your surname?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez fermer la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please close the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yī xiàbān jiù huíjiā le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dès qu'il a fini le travail, il est rentré chez lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: As soon as he finished work, he went home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le liǎng zhāng diànyǐng piào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté deux billets de cinéma.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought two movie tickets.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a quelqu'un dehors.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is someone outside the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng wèn nǐ yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais te poser une question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to ask you a question.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī jiàn xīn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté un nouveau vêtement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a new piece of clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est très jolie quand elle sourit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She looks very pretty when she smiles.
